text:
Your adventure begins now.
What is it that you seek?
Your adventure begins.
Select from the following...
Continue your adventure.
Select from the following...

Gain HP recovery ability with a drawback. Gain items.
Gain HP recovery ability with a drawback. Gain items.
Get one of the following enhancements. Gain items.
Get one of the following enhancements. Gain items.
Recruit one of the following warriors. Gain items.
The contents of the Style tiles ahead will be changed to one of the following. Gain items.
Contents of tiles ahead cannot be changed.

From The Final Fantasy Legend
The way is blocked by a deadly barrier! So-Cho's here to help!
So-Cho: "Leave it to me!"

From Final Fantasy Legend II
Father fell while protecting the heroes. The heroes use the MAGI's power to save him, and Goddess Isis appears!

From Romancing SaGa -Minstrel Song-
Someone suddenly appears in front of you!
"I am Scorn, a minion of Saruin. Now, hand over the medallions!"

From Romancing SaGa -Minstrel Song-
Your party arrives at Cap. Silver's Cave on Walon Isle. You run into a dragon protecting the treasure in the depths of the cave!

From Romancing SaGa -Minstrel Song-
Schiele has the Diamond of Light as a ring. Scorn demands the Fatestone, using your lives as leverage.

From Romancing SaGa -Minstrel Song-
Constance's father Theodore is acting strange. She has a feeling he's an impostor.

From Romancing SaGa
You meet Galahad in Altours. He seems to have obtained his long-sought after Ice Sword.

From Romancing SaGa 2
After wandering through the savannah, you come to a village in the south. There seems to be an inn.

From Romancing SaGa 2
The Empress visits the Sunken Tower after seeing the image of it at Eirunep Shrine. The queen seems to know its secrets.

From Romancing SaGa 2
The Empress visits the cave of the Child & Mu Calf. When she tries to go deeper into the cave, Dantarg of the Seven Heroes blocks her way.

From Romancing SaGa 3
Your party visits Fairyville. The fairy you rescued from the Show of Wonders tells you how to get to the Fire Fortress.

From Romancing SaGa 3
Your party travels from Pidona Old Town to the Archfiend Palace. As you proceed inside the palace, you discover an Abyss Gate.

From Romancing SaGa 3
Your party visits the town of Kyrdlund. The townsfolk are troubled by the creature prowling their borders. The mayor asks you to get rid of the creature.

From Romancing SaGa 3
Your party arrives at Pidona Old Town. Muse has imbibed the Dream Eater's serum. Charl intends to enter her dreams to rescue her.

From SaGa Frontier
Asellus and Princess White Rose hear rumors of a water mystic, so they visit the Lord Manor in Owmi.

From SaGa Frontier
In the garden of Kyo, you meet Princess Lion, one of the arch princesses of Orlouge. She intends to fight you to take back Princess White Rose.

From SaGa Frontier
Annie and Lyza are members of the secret organization Gladius. Roufas, their leader, invites you to join them.

From SaGa Frontier
Emelia is on a mission for Gladius to participate in a masked martial arts tournament. However, she mistakes it for a mask-erade...

From SaGa Frontier
At Black X's base, Red's party finds a furnace for making drugs.
"This must be the furnace they used to make drugs. Alright, let's blow this place away."

From SaGa Frontier
At Black X's base, Red tracks down Shuzer of the Four Emperors, but Shuzer escapes at the last moment.

From SaGa Frontier 2
In Thermes, Gustave XIII was born to the king of Finney and Sophie. When he turns seven, a certain ceremony is held.

From SaGa Frontier 2
Gustave hears that his mother Sophie is on her deathbed and returns to her side. "No, please mother. Don't leave me alone."

From SaGa Frontier 2
Rich gets a strange chill after returning from Life Tree Island.
"That egg-like thing the girl's carrying..."

From SaGa Frontier 2
Ginny heads to the Insect Megalith at Roberto's suggestion. There, she finds her father's belongings.
"Papa was here. ...Papa..."

Form Romancing SaGa Re;univerSe
Barthelemy is pursued and mortally wounded, and just as he is about to draw his last breath, a mysterious mask appears.

From Romancing SaGa Re;univerSe
The World Tower, a massive Grave, appears.
"I can't even see the top! It can't be! Is this giant Grave... the World Tower?!"

From Romancing SaGa Re;univerSe
Ha-ha-ha-ha! From the heavens above to the earth below... Do any evil, and Robin shall know!
Face the unity of the Robin Family, the hammer of justice!

From Romancing SaGa Re;univerSe
Bertrand has gained the power of the Abyss. In order to stop Bertrand, the twin stars of destiny face off.

So-Cho destroys the deadly barrier at the cost of his life!
"So-Cho!"
"I've shown you a real man, haven't I!?"
"You fool! You didn't have to do that!"

Okay! He'll be alright now.
Goddess uses her power to save Father!
A warrior joins your party.

To a minion of Saruin? Never!
"Make no mistake. They will be mine!"
The battle with Scorn begins!

You look for an opening and manage to flee the scene.
Your horizons broaden.

Do you have what it takes to bear my Fatestone?
The battle with the Silver Dragon begins!

You walk away from the Silver Dragon without fighting it.
Your horizons broaden.
Upon removing the Diamond of Light, the sealed power of darkness is released, and Schirach awakens! Schirach attacks!

You look for an opening and manage to flee the scene with Schiele.
A warrior joins your party.
You and Constance manage to find the real Theodore. You join the real Theodore to expose the phony!

You convince Constance that this is the real Theodore!
Your horizons broaden.

You and Galahad go your separate ways.
Your horizons broaden.

You defeat Galahad.
You obtain a valuable item for battle.

I can sympathize, but I went to great lengths to get this sword. How about we go together, then?
A warrior joins your party.
You fall asleep at the inn. Suddenly, termites attack the village!

You decide not to rest just yet.
Your horizons broaden.

Empress... You crawl around this world like a maggot in flesh. To the abyss!
The queen is Rocbouquet, one of the Seven Heroes. Rocbouquet attacks!

You walk away from the queen.
Your horizons broaden.

Huh? Did I hear that right? You'll let me go? You're in no position to threaten me!
Dantarg attacks!

You give up exploring the cave of the Child & Mu Calf and turn back.
Your horizons broaden.
You discover an Abyss Gate deep within the Fire Fortress!

Instead of going to the Fire Fortress, you go in a different direction.
Your horizons broaden.

Everyone ready for this?
Something is emerging from the Abyss Gate!
"Bleed for me!"

The party turns around because you are not ready.
Your horizons broaden.

As soon as your party enters the cave, the entrance is blocked from the outside.
"So this was your plan... You treacherous wretch!"
"I'm sorry, did you say something?"
"As mayor I have to prioritize the town's safety. Toodle-oo, and best of luck!"

You leave the town of Kyrdlund behind to go to another region.
Your horizons broaden.
Your party drinks the Dream Eater's serum with Charl and enters the dream. You find the frightened Muse in the dream. It seems the only way out is to defeat the Dream Eater.

You decide to wait for Charl to rescue Muse and return.
Your horizons broaden.
A water mystic is trapped in the Lord Manor. You decide to help the water mystic, Mesarthim, who wants to go home to her friends. You go to the basement of the manor to find a way out.

You leave the Lord Manor behind to go to another region.
Your horizons broaden.

Princess Lion is raring to go!
"I am the one who'll fight you!"
"The only man who ever beat me was Lord Orlouge himself. Get ready!"

You look for an opening and manage to flee the scene.
Your horizons broaden.

Emelia decides to join the organization.
"Let me introduce our new member."
"Hi, I am Emelia."

Emelia decides to act independently instead of joining the organization.
Your horizons broaden.

Strange... It doesn't feel like a dance.
"Emelia, put this on."
"No thanks. I brought my own dress."
"Just put this on."

Emelia asks for a different mission.
Your horizons broaden.

Red's party blows up Black X's base and flees. But someone is there to stop them!
"You destroyed the base? I see. But, can you beat me?"

Red's party decides to regroup first without blowing up the base.
Your horizons broaden.
Your infamous terrorist activities have been spreading fear across the regions. Many innocent people have died by your wicked hands. Justice finally catches up with you today.

Red's party decides to regroup first instead of going after Shuzer.
Your horizons broaden.
At the age of seven, Gustave has failed the Firebrand Ceremony. His mother Sophie defends him and they are both banished from the castle.
Sophie's Anima has returned to nature. Gustave thanks all of the people who took care of him.

What the girl is holding is the Egg!
"You're from the Knights family. I can sense the Knights Anima within you."
And so, Rich's fate becomes intertwined with the Egg.

Suddenly, monsters attack!
"Are you alright, Ginny?"
"Yes, of course!"

You search the area but find nothing of interest.
Ginny leaves the Insect Megalith behind.
Your horizons broaden.
I feed on life. Always provide me life to feed upon. Take life for me until your flesh rots. You will serve me.

The World Tower shows visions of the Maiden of Lance. You explore the World Tower and open the doors at its summit!
"If I can fulfill the wishes of the people... I'll do it. I will become the Matriarch."
Exploring the World Tower seems like it's going to take a long time. Your party decides to explore another region first. Your horizons broaden.
We're supposed to be Polka Family before Robin Family. And I think... If you're calling yourselves the Robin Family, I have every right to be a part of it, too!

You leave the enemies there to the Robin Family and hurry on ahead.
Your horizons broaden.

Jo and Bertrand's battle begins!
"Can you get out of the way? I've a boring creature to eradicate."

You decide to regroup first instead of fighting Bertrand right away.
Your horizons broaden.
Select the option you prefer.
You make a great sacrifice and receive as great a reward.
You make some sacrifices and receive some form of reward.
You sacrifice little and earn as much in return.

Welcome to Battle Historia.
The tutorial will now begin.
